posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: April 6, 2015 at 9:27 PM#31.) a Page has no on or off status, when applying the Off-command to a Page, the command is relayed to the executors of the page.2.) a Speedgroup has no on or off status, when applying the Off-command to a Speedgroup, the command is relayed to any executors using that speedgroup.I assume you have a speedgroup assigned to an executor on page 1, and that your executors on other pages are linked to that speedgroup, thus offing page 1 will off your sdpeedgroup which will off your other pages
